QuestionJSON.Question: Valen is part of a group project on the 'Transportation Revolution'. The group decides to animate the birth and growth of canals, railways, and telegraph lines over time. Valen’s role is to write the codes for the animation. What should Valen do first to ensure successful collaboration within the team?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: Valen should start writing the code for the animation immediately
QuestionJSON.Answer2: Valen should wait for the team to provide precise instructions before starting to code
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Valen should independently do research on the revolution to ensure the animation is historically accurate
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Valen should have a clear discussion with the team to understand their expectations on visual depiction, timeline, and additional visual cues to add more context to the animation
QuestionJSON.Explanation: The most effective and collaborative way forward is for Valen to discuss and understand the expectations and requirements of the team. Building such a comprehensive animation would require a good understanding of historical points, significant events, aesthetic expectations, important visual cues, and so forth. Gathering this information would also help Valen contribute meaningful suggestions about the animation.
